title: jnAna jyOti nanu brOvavE
sahitya:
jnAna jyOti jUpi nanu brOvavE nAdavindu kalAtIta nAraNI OM


anupallavi

  mauna shikharamandu muddugA velayu mOkSa turyAtIta paramAkSarI Om


caraNam    antarAtma nija cintanambulO atishaya navarasa gAnamutO sundara naTanAnanda lIlalADu
shuddha shakti Om surarAja gaurI janaranjani manaranjani bhavabhanjani jagajjananI Om
